PrimaryTitle: Create and Join to your favorite chats
PrimaryDesc: With this app, you can chat with everyone at any time! lets start socializing an meet some new people you just need to create a room and start the fun!
1stCaracteristicTitle: Enjoy your chats with privacy without worries
1stCaracteristicDesc: Our chats are secured with encriptation methods which allow to our users to chat between them without any third party stealing your data. Rest assured that anyone will not steal your information!
2ndCaracteristicDesc: We dont limit the use of our chat app, even though is free we want to give our users the freedom to chat whatever they want without being stopped by us!
1stFunctionDesc: Our messages are encriptated in both ways to ensure a good user experience and to protect our users data.
2ndFunctionDesc: Our server are always connected, so dont bother about the service being down, just enjoy your chats.
3rdFunctionDesc: We have our administrators always at total alert in case  something happens, so dont worry and if you have problems just text us.
4thFunctionDesc: Rest assured that your messages will not be read by us, the privacy of our users is one of our pillars, your messages are private.
AcceptTerms: I agree with the Terms and conditions
